Name: Flappy Bee
About the game: Flappy Bee is a high-score chasing thrill ride based upon staying alive while dodging lava and birds. Press the Space bar to fly or click the screen to dodge obstacles and keep your lives for as long as possible. High-scores Flowers Survive in A Forest Lava Birds
